response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value to you at $15,000, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value and is an opportunity not to be missed. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can enhance your experience.", "product_price": 12000}
